successes.title: KEGSMARTS:  Smart Craft Brewpub Kegerator
successes.description: KEGSMARTS brings a craft brewpub to your home, with perfect draft pours, beer stats, ratings, temperature & servings control and more!

Pledges.description: SHOUT IT!  You want to get KegSmarter, so go ahead and say it on a (bumper) sticker:  KegSmarts baby!  (US shipping included, taxes not included)
WEAR IT!  You've got a smart kegerator and your craft beer is pouring fine!   Let the world know by wearing a KegSmarts(TM) Logo T-Shirt (US Shipping included, taxes not included)
BUILD-YOUR-OWN EARLY BIRD.  If you've already got your own kegerator, KegSmarts BYO is what you need to make it smart.  (Shipping and taxes not included)

BUILD-YOUR-OWN EXPERIMENTER.  If you've already got your own kegerator, and it's a non-standard design, or you have a non-US power requirement, EXPERIMENTER is what you want.  No power cables or power box included.  (Shipping and taxes not included)
BUILD-YOUR-OWN.  If you've already got your own kegerator, KegSmarts BYO is what you need to make it smart.  (Shipping and taxes not included)
SINGLE-TAP KEGERATOR EARLY BIRD.  This is it:  the KegSmarts craft-beer single-tap kegerator. Enjoy great craft-beer at home! (Shipping and taxes not included)
DOUBLE-TAP KEGERATOR EARLY BIRD.  This is it:  the KegSmarts craft-beer double-tap kegerator. Enjoy great craft-beer at home! (Shipping and taxes not included)
DOUBLE-TAP KEGERATOR.  This is it:  the KegSmarts craft-beer double-tap kegerator. Enjoy great craft-beer at home! (Shipping and taxes not included)
DOUBLE-TAP KEGERATOR WITH 2 KEGPLATES.  This is it:  the KegSmarts craft-beer double-tap kegerator together with 2 KegPlates that will auto-measure your beer volume. Enjoy great craft-beer at home!

HOME BREWER HEAVEN.   You want it all: Your own home craft brewpub!  You've come to the right place!  Included is a PicoBrew Zymatic(R) for brewing your own great craft beer, KegSmarts Double Kegerator, two KegPlates, a KegWarmer, two kegs, and your first recipe kit.   (Shipping and taxes not included)

ULTIMATE HOME CRAFT BREW EXPERIENCE.
This includes everything + we will fly PicoBrewâ€™s award-winning, in-house master brewer, Annie Johnson to your house. She will help you set everything up, design a custom recipe for your tastes, and spend a day helping you brew your first batch. Just to cover any questions this ultimate package includes: Annie Johnson @ your house (max 8 hours), 1 PicoBrew Zymatic, 1 double tap KegSmarts, 2 kegs, 2 weight plates, 1 Fermenter cozy, 2 T-Shirts, and KegSmarts stickers. To be arranged on a mutually agreeable date between March 15th and October 15, 2015.
